subject:
Re: svn commit: samba r23111 - in
	branches/SAMBA_4_0/source/build/m4: .
body:
24 maj 2007 kl. 04.28 skrev metze@samba.org:

> Author: metze
> Date: 2007-05-24 09:28:49 +0000 (Thu, 24 May 2007)
> New Revision: 23111

> nicer ./configure --help output

To get the spaces right for --help formating, AS_HELP_STRING() is  
your friend.

Love
